field.name: description
field.value:
The attached patch adds some convenience methods to simplify programmatic configuration:
ViewEngineConfig.SetRelativeViewDirectory(string dir) ----------------------------------------------------- Sets ViewEngineConfig.ViewDirectory to a directory relative to the current app domain's base dir.
ViewEngineConfig.AddViewEngine<TViewEngine>(bool xhtmlRendering) ---------------------------------------------------------------- Adds a view engine of type TViewEngine.
SmtpConfig.ConfigureFromConfigFile() ------------------------------------ Uses the settings found in the system.net/mailSettings/smtp/network element of the app config (app.config or web.config) to configure SmtpConfig.
Example:
protected override void OnMonoRailConfigure(IMonoRailConfiguration configuration) { configuration.ViewEngineConfig .SetRelativeViewDirectory("views") .AddViewEngine<AspViewEngine>(true) .AddViewEngine<NVelocityViewEngine>(true); configuration.SmtpConfig.ConfigureFromConfigFile(); }
